class_notes: (ONLINE: synchronous live sessions Thursdays 3:00pm-4:30pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via online asynchronous engagement)
course_description: A study of Barth's theology across the course of his career, with attention to his influence on contemporary theology.
prerequisites: Courses attached to this requirement will have CT503/ST 501 as a prerequisite for MDiv and Non-degree students.
